title: another one
content:
Steps to Follow:

  1. Frontend:
  • Create a form with an image upload input and a title input.
  • On form submission, send the image to the */upload" endpoint.
  • After receiving the extracted text, send the title and extracted text to the */save endpoint.
  1. Backend:
  • Ensurethe /upload’ endpoint extracts and returns the text properly.
  • Ensurethe "/save' endpoint saves the title and extracted text to both the SQLite database and the JSON file. Frontend Workflow:
  1. User uploads an image and enters a title.
  2. Form submission triggers a request to thy /upload’ endpoint.
